topic.title: 인터넷 연결 문제로 고객센터에 문의하기
topic.description: 인터넷이 갑자기 끊겼을 때 고객센터에 전화해서 문제를 설명하고 해결을 요청하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 네, 고객님. 성함과 주소를 말씀해 주시겠어요?
네, 이미 해봤는데 여전히 작동하지 않아요.
알겠습니다. 저희 쪽에서 신호를 확인해 보겠습니다. 잠시만 기다려주세요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm calling about an internet issue.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm calling about an internet issue.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: My internet connection suddenly stopped working.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: My internet connection | suddenly stopped working.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, ma'am. Could you please tell me your name and address?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, ma'am. || Could you please tell me | your name and address?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Have you tried turning the router off and on again?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Have you tried | turning the router off and on again?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, I've already tried that, but it's still not working.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | I've already tried that, || but it's still not working.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I see. We will check the signal from our end. Please hold on for a moment.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I see. || We will check the signal | from our end. || Please hold on for a moment.
